CsvInfoModal.identifierInfo: Any identifying string, such as a student ID or email address. Maximum 64 characters
CsvInfoModal.listClassesAssigned: Classes to which the user will be assigned as a coach:
CsvInfoModal.listClassesAssignedL1: Do not use for learner users
CsvInfoModal.listClassesAssignedL2: List of class names, separated by commas
CsvInfoModal.listClassesAssignedL3: If an existing class does not match by name, it will be created
CsvInfoModal.listClassesEnrolled: Classes to enroll the user in as a learner:
CsvInfoModal.listClassesEnrolledL1: Can be any type of user
CsvInfoModal.listClassesEnrolledL2: Write the class names separated by commas
CsvInfoModal.listClassesEnrolledL3: If an existing class does not match by name, a new class with that name will be created
CsvInfoModal.passwordInfo: Maximum 125 characters. To leave unchanged, use an asterisk:
CsvInfoModal.sectionDescription: A CSV spreadsheet should use the first row as a header, and contain the following columns:
CsvInfoModal.usernameInfo: Maximum 125 characters. Can contain letters, numbers and underscores
CsvInfoModal.uuidInfo: An ID used by Kolibri to uniquely identify a user. Leave it blank to create a new user
DataPage.description: The default start date is the last time you exported this log
DataPage.futureDateError: You cannot select a future date
DataPage.pageSubHeading: Download CSV (comma-separated value) files containing information about users and their interactions with the resources on this device
DataPage.startDateAfterEndDateError: Start date cannot be after end date
DataPage.title: Select a date range
DeleteUserModal.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the user '{ username }'?
DeleteUserModal.warning: All data and logs for this user will be lost.
EditDeviceSyncSchedule.checkboxLabel: If scheduled sync fails, keep trying
EditDeviceSyncSchedule.deviceNotConnecte: This device is not currently connected to your network.
EditDeviceSyncSchedule.removeDeviceWarni: You are about to remove this device from the sync schedule.
EditFacilityNameModal.renameFacilityExpl: Warning: Only the facility name will be changed, and the new name will be synced and updated on other devices linked to this facility.
EditFacilityNameModal.title: Rename facility
FacilityConfigPage.deviceManagementDescr: This 4-digit PIN allows users to manage content and other settings on learn-only devices
FacilityConfigPage.deviceSettings: You can also configure device settings
FacilityConfigPage.learnerCanEditName: Allow learners to edit their full name
FacilityConfigPage.learnerCanEditPasswor: Allow learners to edit their password when signed in
FacilityConfigPage.learnerCanEditUsernam: Allow learners to edit their username
FacilityConfigPage.saveFailure: There was a problem saving your settings
FacilityIndex.adminOrSuperuser: You must be signed in as an admin or super admin to view this page
IdentifierTextbox.label: Identifier (Optional)
ImportInterface.editCSV: Edit user info using an external spreadsheet program
ImportInterface.exportCSV: Export a CSV file which contains all users, and the classes that they are associated with
ImportInterface.importCSV: Import a CSV file to create and update users
ImportInterface.sectionDescription: You can manage, import and export many users and classes at once:
Init.beforeCommitting: Before committing the import you will be shown a summary of changes that will be made.
Init.caution: CAUTION: importing from CSV will make many changes to your users and classes, and these changes cannot be easily reverted.
Init.importL2: update existing users (for users with matching usernames)
Init.importL3: set which classes each learner is enrolled in
Init.importL4: set which classes each coach is assigned to
Init.importL5: create new classes (for any referenced class names that do not yet exist)
Init.introduction: When importing from a spreadsheet you can create, update, and optionally delete dozens or hundreds of facility users at a time by loading new information from comma-separated-value (CSV) files.
Init.labelDelete: Also delete users and classes not in CSV
Init.optionally: Optionally, you can also delete users and classes that are not referenced in the spreadsheet.
Init.proceed: To proceed, select a CSV file:
LearnMoreModal.sessionLogText: When a user views a resource, we record how long they spend and the progress they make. Each row in this file records a single visit a user made to a specific resource. This includes anonymous usage, when no user is signed in.
LearnMoreModal.summaryLogText: A user may visit the same resource multiple times. This file records the total time and progress each user has achieved for each resource, summarized across possibly more than one visit. Anonymous usage is not included.
LearnerClassEnrollmentPage.pageSubheader: Only showing learners that are not enrolled in this class
ManageSyncSchedule.introduction: Set a schedule for Kolibri to automatically sync with other Kolibri devices sharing this facility. Devices with the same sync schedule will be synced one at a time.
PaginatedListContainerWithBackend.pagina: { visibleStartRange, number } - { visibleEndRange, number } of { numFilteredItems, number }
Preview.importError: Importing is not possible due to the following errors:
Preview.someRowErrors: These rows have errors and will be skipped if you continue:
Preview.summary: Summary of changes if you choose to import:
PrivacyModal.privacyText: By syncing this facility with the Kolibri Data Portal, you are granting access to your data to organization admins on Kolibri Data Portal. It will be uploaded to cloud servers operated by Learning Equality, who will also have access to this data.
RemovePinModal.title: Remove device management PIN
RemovePinModal.warningToSync: You will need to sync this device with other devices that have the same facility in order for this PIN to be removed.
UserEditPage.changeInDeviceTabPrompt: Go to Device permissions to change this
UserEditPage.forceLogoutWarning: Warning: By making yourself a non-admin, you will be logged out after clicking "Save".

UserPage.noCoachesExist: There are no coaches in this facility
UserPage.noLearnersExist: There are no learners in this facility
